page_content:
Aphari Ltd

Aphari IT Multi-Sourcing Systems Integrator Capability Set-up

Aphari helps organisations transform their IT operating model, adopt cloud services, implement multi source delivery models, establish systems integration and service integration (SIAM) capabilities. Our Systems Integration setup service helps clients establish the functions needed to effectively manage delivery of change initiatives, projects and programmes across the multi-supplier environment.

Features

  • Defines solution and project delivery management approach across supply chain.
  • Identifies delivery and functional governance points, using best practice framework.
  • Ensures integration of requirements management, design authority, solution architecture processes.
  • Includes security, testing, service acceptance products and activities.
  • Addresses specific concerns of managing multi-supplier solutions and projects.
  • Advice on tooling adoption for each functional area, as appropriate.
  • Conducted by multi-disciplinary team, with extensive supply-side multi-sourced delivery experience.
  • Approach based on pragmatic application of public-domain best practices.
  • Our framework includes MOP, MSP/PRINCE, COBIT, TOGAF, ITIL, CCS guidance.
  • Combine with other services including Governance Set-Up, Delivery Lifecycle Accelerator.

Benefits

  • Helps organisations transform their IT operating model and supply chain.
  • Helps clients build in-house capability needed to manage multi-supplier delivery.
  • Improves management of solution and delivery risks in multi-vendor projects.
  • Highlights cross-functional inter relationships and lays foundations for structured collaboration.
  • Helps authority and all suppliers establish effective joint delivery capability.
  • Strong technical focus and experience of delivery at scale.
  • Our methods and techniques proven in complex multi-supplier environments.
  • No lock-in to proprietary or 'branded' methodologies.
  • Our holistic approach speaks to stakeholders in their own language.

Pricing

£950 per unit

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
